title: Additional statements on relations and subclasses

blocks.name: al3im
blocks.content: Version of ~ ax-4 for a nested implication. (Contributed by RP, 13-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: intima0
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing the intersection of images of a class. (Contributed by RP, 13-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm intima0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  dfiin2(s0, s1, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1))
  ax-mp(wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  imaexg(cv(s0), universe, c1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: elimaint
blocks.content: Element of image of intersection. (Contributed by RP, 13-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimaint(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(cint(c0), c1)), wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cima(cint(c0), c1)), wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2)))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cint(c0), cv(s0))))
  elima(s1, cv(s0), cint(c0), c1)
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cint(c0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))))
  bitri(wbr(cv(s1), cint(c0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cint(c0)))
  df-br(cv(s1), cint(c0), cv(s0))
  elint2(s2, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)
  opex(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cint.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm elimaint(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÇ c0 " c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0, < s1, s0 > ‚àà s2)))

  elima(s1, s0, ‚ãÇ c0, c1)

  df-br(s1, ‚ãÇ c0, s0)
  elint2(s2, < s1, s0 >, c0)

blocks.name: csbcog
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through a composition of relations. (Contributed by RP, 28-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbcog(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(csb(s0, c0, ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), csb(s0, c0, ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, ccom(c2, c3))
  coeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), ccom(c2, c3), ccom(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfco(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  coeq12d(c2, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, ccom(c2, c3)), ccom(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm csbcog(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí[c0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[c0 / s0]c3))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, [c0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[c0 / s0]c3), [hs0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3)=([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[hs0 / s0]c3))
  eqeq12d([hs0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[hs0 / s0]c3), [c0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3), ([c0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[c0 / s0]c3), hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, (c2 ‚àò c3))
  coeq12d([hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, hs0, (c2 ‚àò c3), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[hs0 / s0]c3))
  vex(hs0)
  nfco(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  coeq12d(c2, c3, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0](c2 ‚àò c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 ‚àò[c0 / s0]c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cnviun
blocks.content: Converse of indexed union. (Contributed by RP, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnviun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1)))
  relcnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  mprgbir(s0, c0, wrel(ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))), wrel(ccnv(c1)))
  reliun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrel(ccnv(c1)))
  relcnv(c1)
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c1))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c1)))
  bicomi(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c1)))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  eliun(s0, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, c1)
  eliun(s0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0, ccnv(c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(ciun(s0, c0, ccnv(c1)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: imaiun1
blocks.content: The image of an indexed union is the indexed union of the images. (Contributed by RP, 29-Jun-2020.)

  rexcom4(s0, hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c1, c2)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  elima3(hs1, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  exbii(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))))

  eliun(s0, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, c1)
  r19.42v(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))
  elima3(hs1, cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)

  diff.hs0.c(cima(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

blocks.name: coiun1
blocks.content: Composition with an indexed union. Proof analgous to that of ~ coiun . (Contributed by RP, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm coiun1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ccom(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), ciun(s0, c0, ccom(c1, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, ccom(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), ciun(s0, c0, ccom(c1, c2)))
  relco(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  mprgbir(s0, c0, wrel(ciun(s0, c0, ccom(c1, c2))), wrel(ccom(c1, c2)))
  reliun(s0, c0, ccom(c1, c2))

  dfss2(hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3))

thm ss2iundv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
